sentences.en: A smear of the fluid should be stained and examined.
sentences.cn: 应作穿刺液涂片染色检查.

sentences.en: an attempt to smear the party leadership
sentences.cn: 污蔑党领导的 企图

sentences.en: Be careful, the paint may smear.
sentences.cn: 当心, 油漆会涂污的.
小心, 油漆会弄脏东西.

sentences.en: Don't smear the lens; I've just polished it.
sentences.cn: 别把镜头弄脏了, 我刚刚擦过.

sentences.en: He has been spreading false stories in an attempt to smear us.
sentences.cn: 他一直在散布谎言企图诽谤我们.

sentences.en: He puts all the accusations down to a smear campaign by his political opponents.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的指责都归结为政治对手们的造谣攻势。

sentences.en: Smear a little olive oil over the inside of the salad bowl.
sentences.cn: 在色拉碗的内壁上抹一点橄榄油。

sentences.en: Smear Vaseline on to your baby's skin to prevent soreness.
sentences.cn: 给孩子皮肤上抹些凡士林以防止肿痛。

sentences.en: The cervical smear test is a lifesaver.
sentences.cn: 宫颈涂片检查能够帮上大忙。

sentences.en: The etiologic agent may not be apparent on direct smear.
sentences.cn: 在直接涂片上致病菌可能不明确.

sentences.en: The newspapers ran a smear campaign against him.
sentences.cn: 报界掀起了一阵诽谤他的浪潮.

sentences.en: There was a smear of blood on the wall.
There was a smear of gravy on his chin.
There's a smear on your shirt.
You should smear your hands with grease.

trans.tran_cn: 污迹，污点，黏稠物，（显微镜的）涂片，诽谤，诋毁
trans.tran_en: a dirty mark made by a small amount of something spread across a surface

trans.tran_cn: 诽谤；弄脏；涂上；把…擦模糊
trans.tran_en: to tell an untrue story about someone important in order to make people lose respect for them – used especially in newspapers

trans.tran_cn: 涂抹，敷，弄脏，污蔑，诋毁，〈俚〉彻底击败，摧毁
